languages.text: "Следовало сделать это давным давно, {name}". {n}В глазах дознавателя вспыхивают злые огоньки.{/n} "Тем не менее, если ты сдержишь свое обещание, я буду весьма... нет, неописуемо признателен".

traits.locale_text: "Следовало сделать это давным давно, {name}". {n}В глазах дознавателя вспыхивают злые огоньки.{/n} "Тем не менее, если ты сдержишь свое обещание, я буду весьма... нет, неописуемо признателен".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "What you should have done so long before now, {name}." {n}The Interrogator's eyes gleam with malice.{/n} "Nevertheless, if you keep your promise, I will be extremely... no, indescribably grateful."
languages.original_text: "Следовало сделать это давным давно, {name}". {n}В глазах дознавателя вспыхивают злые огоньки.{/n} "Тем не менее, если ты сдержишь свое обещание, я буду весьма... нет, неописуемо признателен".

traits.locale_text: "What you should have done so long before now, {name}." {n}The Interrogator's eyes gleam with malice.{/n} "Nevertheless, if you keep your promise, I will be extremely... no, indescribably grateful."

traits.locale_text: "What you should have done so long before now, {name}." {n}The Interrogator's eyes gleam with malice.{/n} "Nevertheless, if you keep your promise, I will be extremely... no, indescribably grateful."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你早该这么做的，{name}。”{n}这位审讯官眼中闪烁着恶毒的光芒。{/n}“但即便如此，只要你信守承诺，我将会对你非常感激……不，我的感激之情将无以言表。”
languages.original_text: "What you should have done so long before now, {name}." {n}The Interrogator's eyes gleam with malice.{/n} "Nevertheless, if you keep your promise, I will be extremely... no, indescribably grateful."

traits.locale_text: “你早该这么做的，{name}。”{n}这位审讯官眼中闪烁着恶毒的光芒。{/n}“但即便如此，只要你信守承诺，我将会对你非常感激……不，我的感激之情将无以言表。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "What you should have done so long before now, ." {n}The Interrogator's eyes gleam with malice.{/n} "Nevertheless, if you keep your promise, I will be extremely... no, indescribably grateful."

languages.text: «Lo que debería haber hecho hace mucho, {name}». {n}Los ojos del interrogador brillan con malicia.{/n} «No obstante, si cumple su promesa, le estaré extremadamente... no, indescriptiblemente agradecido».
languages.original_text: "What you should have done so long before now, {name}." {n}The Interrogator's eyes gleam with malice.{/n} "Nevertheless, if you keep your promise, I will be extremely... no, indescribably grateful."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que debería haber hecho hace mucho, {name}». {n}Los ojos del interrogador brillan con malicia.{/n} «No obstante, si cumple su promesa, le estaré extremadamente... no, indescriptiblemente agradecido».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「それはずっと前にすべきことだったのだ、{name}」{n}インテロゲイターの目が悪意に輝く。{/n}「それでも、もし約束を守るのであれば、非常に…いや、尽くせぬほどの感謝を示そう」
languages.original_text: "What you should have done so long before now, {name}." {n}The Interrogator's eyes gleam with malice.{/n} "Nevertheless, if you keep your promise, I will be extremely... no, indescribably grateful."

traits.locale_text: 「それはずっと前にすべきことだったのだ、{name}」{n}インテロゲイターの目が悪意に輝く。{/n}「それでも、もし約束を守るのであれば、非常に…いや、尽くせぬほどの感謝を示そう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Was ihr schon lange hättet tun sollen, {name}." {n}Die Augen des Interrogators funkeln böse.{/n} "Dennoch, wenn Ihr Euer Versprechen haltet, werde ich extrem ... nein unbeschreiblich dankbar sein."
languages.original_text: "What you should have done so long before now, {name}." {n}The Interrogator's eyes gleam with malice.{/n} "Nevertheless, if you keep your promise, I will be extremely... no, indescribably grateful."

traits.locale_text: "Was ihr schon lange hättet tun sollen, {name}." {n}Die Augen des Interrogators funkeln böse.{/n} "Dennoch, wenn Ihr Euer Versprechen haltet, werde ich extrem ... nein unbeschreiblich dankbar sein."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous auriez dû le faire il y a bien longtemps, {name}, {n}déclare l'interrogateur avec un air malveillant.{/n} Mais qu'importe. Si vous tenez votre promesse, je vous en serai extrêmement... non, incroyablement reconnaissant. »
languages.original_text: "What you should have done so long before now, {name}." {n}The Interrogator's eyes gleam with malice.{/n} "Nevertheless, if you keep your promise, I will be extremely... no, indescribably grateful."

traits.locale_text: « Vous auriez dû le faire il y a bien longtemps, {name}, {n}déclare l'interrogateur avec un air malveillant.{/n} Mais qu'importe. Si vous tenez votre promesse, je vous en serai extrêmement... non, incroyablement reconnaissant. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Şimdiye dek yapmış olman gerekeni yapacağım {name}." {n}Sorgucu'nun gözleri kötülükle ışıldıyor.{/n} "İyi bakalım. Sözünde durursan ziyadesiyle... Yok, fevkalade müteşekkir olurum."
languages.original_text: "What you should have done so long before now, {name}." {n}The Interrogator's eyes gleam with malice.{/n} "Nevertheless, if you keep your promise, I will be extremely... no, indescribably grateful."
